block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across Connecticut this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the Connecticut Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to ctcivic@nytimes.com.
STATE OF CONNECTICUT
Guilford Connecticut Siting Council public hearing. Tuesday at 3:30 p.m. and 7 p.m. Guilford High School Auditorium, 605 New England Road. (860) 827-2935.
Hartford Citizen's Ethics Advisory Board. Thursday at 1 p.m. 18-20 Trinity Street, Conference Room 2A. (860) 566-4472.
Hartford State Solid Waste Advisory Committee. Tuesday at 9:30 a.m. Connecticut Department of Environmental Protection Headquarters, 79 Elm Street. (860) 424-3096.
Kent Connecticut Trustee Subcouncil. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Kent Town Hall, 41 Kent Green Boulevard. (860) 927-3433.
FAIRFIELD COUNTY
Bethel Inland Wetlands Commission. Monday at 7 p.m. Clifford J. Hurgin Municipal Center, 1 School Street. (203) 794-8501.
Bethel Building Committee of Bethel High School. Thursday at 7 p.m. Clifford J. Hurgin Municipal Center, 1 School Street. (203) 794-8501.
Danbury Environmental Impact Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Danbury City Hall, 155 Deer Hill Avenue. (203) 797-4500.
Darien Charter Revision Commission. Thursday at 11 a.m. Darien Town Hall, 2 Renshaw Road. (203) 656-7300.
Darien Planning and Zoning Commission. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Darien Town Hall, 2 Renshaw Road. (203) 656-7300.
Monroe Town Council. Monday at 8 p.m. Monroe Town Hall, 7 Fan Hill Road. (203) 452-5417.
Trumbull Town Council. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Trumbull Town Hall, 5866 Main Street. (203) 452-5000.
Weston Saugatuck River Project. Tuesday at 9 a.m. Weston Town Hall, 56 Norfield Road. (203) 222-2656.
Wilton Inland Wetlands Department. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Wilton Town Hall, 238 Danbury Road. (203) 563-0100.
HARTFORD COUNTY
New Britain Citizens Network of the Capitol Region forum. Saturday at 1 p.m. New Britain Museum of American Art, 56 Lexington Street. (860) 229-0257 or peopleprosperityplace.org/forums.
West Hartford Citizens Network of the Capitol Region forum. Wednesday at 7 p.m. St. Joseph College, 1678 Asylum Avenue. (860) 278-4090 or peopleprosperityplace.org/forums.
LITCHFIELD COUNTY
Barkhamsted Board of Selectmen. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Barkhamsted Town Hall, 67 Ripley Hill Road. (860) 379-8285.
Goshen Planning and Zoning Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Goshen Town Hall, 42 North Street. (860) 491-2308.
New Milford Economic Development Commission. Thursday at 5:30 p.m. New Milford Town Hall, 10 Main Street. (860) 355-6020.
New Milford Farmland Preservation Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. New Milford Town Hall, 10 Main Street. (860) 355-6020.
Woodbury Board of Selectmen. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Shove Building, 281 Main Street South. (203) 263-2144.
Woodbury Park and Recreation Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Shove Building, 281 Main Street South. (203) 263-2144.
MIDDLESEX COUNTY
Chester Conservation Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Chester Town Hall, 203 Middlesex Avenue. (860) 526-0013.
Middlefield Planning and Zoning Commission. Wednesday at 6 p.m. Middlefield Community Center, 405 Main Street. (860) 349-7114.
NEW HAVEN COUNTY
Cheshire Water Pollution Control Authority. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Cheshire Town Hall, 84 South Main Street. (203) 271-6660.
Cheshire Planning and Zoning Commission public hearing. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Cheshire Town Hall, 84 South Main Street. (203) 271-6660.
Orange Park and Recreation Committee. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Orange Town Hall, 617 Orange Center Road. (203) 891-2122.
NEW LONDON COUNTY
Groton Zoning Board of Appeals. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Groton Town Hall, 45 Fort Hill Road. (860) 441-6640.
Groton Groton-New London Airport Advisory Committee. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Groton Town Hall, 45 Fort Hill Road. (860) 441-6640.
Lebanon Planning and Zoning Subcommittee. Thursday at 7 p.m. Lebanon Town Hall, 579 Exeter Road. (860) 642-7319.
TOLLAND COUNTY
Andover Board of Finance. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Old Firehouse, Center Street. (860) 742-7305.
Andover Planning and Zoning Commission. Monday at 7 p.m. Old Firehouse, Center Street. (860) 742-7305.
Tolland Town Council Annual Budget Presentation. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Tolland High School, 1 Eagle Hill Road. (860) 871-3600.
WINDHAM COUNTY
Ashford Economic Development Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Ashford Town Office Building, 5 Town Hall Road. (860) 487-4401.
Woodstock Conservation Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Woodstock Town Hall, 415 Route 169. (860) 928-6595.
